topicTitle: How the fuck do I play this game.

posts.postText: Kill zombies, work together as a team. Stay close to the antidote area or else you can become poisoned. It's to prevent campers. Grab various props to use to make weapons, barricades, and other various items.

Rule #1 Don't die.



If you die, you become a zombie.

1. Kill
2. Murder
3. Destroy
4. Obliterate
5. MEDIC!!!
6. Kill
7. Blast
8. Shoot
9. BARRICADES!!
10. ZOMBIFIED

Gash had a better explaination, but yours has steps in it lol.
Oh and why can't I keep the same class the next round?  
like.. I click on Engineer and after that round it looks like it
has already been pressed, and I have to pick another class D:
